bug.short_desc: Unable to search for IP addresses in repos

long_desc.thetext:
When attempting to locate specific octet's of an IP address, the search is successfull only under the following:
** Example search is to locate IP Address (192.168.1.254)
When search is performed on two (2) octets, a valid respons is returned. However, when a third octet is specified, the following error is returned:
Your search full:"192.168 . 1" did not match any files
When all four (4) octets are supplied, the query is valid and no problem is returned:
it seems to stick in a space before and after the second period, but not if you do a 4 octet search:
Searched full:"192.168 . 1.254" (Results 1 - 1 of 1) sorted by null
The following thread addresses the issue:
http://opensolaris.org/jive/thread.jspa?messageID=462364&tstart=0
Please let me know what should be supplied with this bug filing as I have not done this before. The basics I can supply are:
OpenGrok v0.8.1 running on Ubuntu server.
